fluff.name: Alternate Ranger
entries: 当这个白发苍苍的男人穿过森林的灌木丛时，他褪色的绿色斗篷使他几乎看不见。他在夜里跟踪的那个特别大的巨魔终于停下来休息了。当这个巨大的畜生躺下睡觉时，一个无声的绿色身影从树上冒了出来，扼杀了这个可怕的怪物的生命。
当巨大的蓝龙降临小镇时，一个半精灵的小个子男人从一阵闪电的路径中滚了出来。脖子上的小汗毛还在因为残余的电流而竖起来，这个有经验的猎人敲了一支箭，让它飞向那只可怕的野兽的方向。当那只咬人的飞镖射中目标时，天蓝色的龙发出一声可怕的吼叫，并坠落到地面上，在那里它躺在一个破碎的一堆。
当这只巨大的猫头鹰熊慢慢地走向她称之为家的小村庄时，一个小半身人女孩向她在灌木丛中的同伴吹起了口哨。在她的示意下，一只巨大的猎犬从藏身处跃出，挑衅地站在猫头鹰熊的面前，它的毛发似乎比其他东西更多。猫头鹰熊被她的伙伴分散了注意力，完全没有想到会被这个矮小的游侠抓住。一旦他们的敌人失去了知觉，半身人和她的狗就把这只伟大的猫头鹰熊释放到数英里之外，让它在那里生活，而不会威胁到他们保护的城镇。
上述三名冒险者被认为是游侠，野性的战士和自然界的守护者。

fluff.name: Defenders of Balance
entries: 游骑兵在两个世界之间度过他们的生活。一方面，他们作为文明的守护者，保护那些居住在社会边缘的人。另一方面，护林员是生存专家，对自然界的动植物有很深的了解。护林员保护社会和荒野之间的平衡。当野生动物离开它们的自然栖息地时，护林员会在它们伤害无辜的农民和旅行者之前追踪它们。当人们侵占荒野时，护林员将对不尊重自然平衡的工业和扩张进行反击。
游骑兵将他们的生命献给了守护文明和荒野交汇的地方，从未完全加入他们用生命捍卫的两个世界中。

fluff.name: Prepared for Anything
entries: 准备面对任何挑战，护林员的核心是生存主义者。荒野是一个严酷的地方，那些不能适应周围环境的人将会死去。在野外，游侠们学会了如何适应。凭借他们对自然界的了解，他们与原始魔法的联系，以及他们的导师传授的技能，只要有足够的时间准备，很少有游侠不能克服的挑战。
每位游侠都有自己的哲学，关于他们如何融入自然界这个相互联系的网络中。有些人将自己视为顶级捕食者，利用他们的武艺和无情的狩猎能力来维持野生动物的秩序。另一些人则将自己看作是自然的谦逊仆人，为野生动物提供服务。

fluff.name: Creating Your Ranger
entries: 考虑一下你的游侠训练的性质。你是和导师一起训练，一起在荒野中游荡，学习所有你能学到的东西？还是你自己建立了与自然世界的原始联系？是什么在激励着你的游侠？你对某种类型的怪物有仇吗？你是一个在寂静的森林中，而在城市街道或沉睡的城镇中感到更舒适的野生战士吗？
无论他们的出身如何，几乎所有的游侠都会选择冒险的生活，将他们对野外的知识传授给下一代。通常，在他们的晚年，这些野生战士会收一个学徒，传授他们所知道的一切，以便在未来的岁月里确保荒野的安全。

entries.name: Quick Build
entries: 你可以按照以下建议快速创建一个游侠。首先，将敏捷调整值设为最高，其次是感知。其次，选择{@background outlander}背景。

default: (a) {@item chain shirt|phb} and a {@item shield|phb} or (b) {@item leather armor|phb}
(a) two {@item shortsword|phb|shortswords} or (b) two {@filter simple melee weapons|items|source=phb|category=basic|type=simple weapon;melee weapon=u~u~sand}
(a) a {@item longbow|phb} and a {@item quiver|phb} of {@item arrows (20)|phb|20 arrows} or (b) a {@filter martial weapon|items|source=phb|category=basic|type=martial weapon}
(a) a {@item dungeoneer's pack|phb} or (b) an {@item explorer's pack|phb}

classFeature.name: Knacks
entries: 在荒野中，你学会了一些原始知识，被称为诀窍(Knacks)，可以增强你的狩猎、生存和追踪技能。在1级时，你可以从本职业末尾的列表中选择一个你喜欢的诀窍。
当你获得一个游侠等级时，你可以用你选择的一个技能替换你已经学会的一个技能。你不能替换作为你已学会的其他技能的先决条件的技能。
在特定的游侠等级上，您可以选择学习额外的技能，如游侠表中的已知技能栏所示。一旦学会，技能就不能被替换。

classFeature.name: Wild Expertise
entries: 你在穿越荒野方面的技能无与伦比。此外，在1级时，选择一个你熟练掌握的来自游侠职业技能列表中的技能。你在使用该技能进行的所有能力检定中，你的熟练加值翻倍。你还可以学习一门额外的语言，通常是你猎杀的生物或你保护的人民所使用的语言之一。
当你达到这个职业的第9级时，你可以选择另一个你在游侠职业技能列表中精通的技能来获得这个好处，以及另一种语言。（Ranger）

classFeature.name: Fighting Style
entries: 你的战斗技巧超过了大多数战士。在2级的时候，你获得了一种从以下列表中选择的战斗风格。你不能多次学习一种格斗术，即使有其他功能允许你学习另一种格斗术。

classFeature.name: Ranger's Quarry
entries: 你集中注意力，像野生动物的捕猎者一样狩猎。此外，在2级时，你可以使用一个额外动作将你看到的一只生物标记为你的猎物，获得以下好处：

items: 每当你对其造成伤害时，你额外造成的伤害等同于你的猎物骰的一次掷骰结果，猎物骰为一枚d4骰。(Quarry Die)
每当你进行一次技能检定来追踪或定位它时，你可以将你的猎物骰投掷结果加到你的d20投掷结果中。

entries: 这些效益持续1小时，但如果你的猎物被杀死或者你将另一个生物标记为你的猎物，效益会提前结束。你可以使用这个特性的次数等于你的感知调整值（最少1次）。当你完成一次长休时，你会恢复所有已用次数。当你没有次数时，你可以消耗一个法术位再次使用这个特性。
当你达到6级、10级、14级和18级时，根据《游侠》表中的指示，游侠猎物的持续时间和猎物骰的大小都会增加。

classFeature.name: Ranger's Quarry (8 hours)
entries: 你的游侠的（Ranger's Quarry）持续时间进一步提升了。

classFeature.name: Ranger's Quarry (24 hours)
entries: 你的游侠的（Ranger's Quarry）持续时间进一步提升了。

classFeature.name: Ranger's Quarry (1 week)
entries: 你的游侠的（Ranger's Quarry）持续时间进一步提升了。

classFeature.name: Ranger's Quarry (Indefinite)
entries: 你的游侠的（Ranger's Quarry）持续时间进一步提升了。

classFeature.name: Spellcasting
entries: 在2级时，你学会了利用自然界的原始魔法来增强你的生存和战斗技能。

entries.name: Preparing and Casting Spells
entries: 上面的游侠表显示了你有多少个法术槽来施展法术。要施放一个一级或更高的（%0%），你必须消耗一个该级别或更高的法术槽。当你完成长时间的休息时，你会重新获得所有消耗的法术槽。
在每次长休结束时，你要准备一份可供施放的法术清单。选择数量等于你的感知调整值 + 游侠等级一半（向下取整）的法术。这些法术必须来自于游侠法术清单，且是你拥有法术位等级的法术。
例如，作为一名拥有14点感知的5级游侠，你可以准备任意四个1级或2级法术，并通过使用1级或2级法术槽来无限次施放每个法术。

entries.name: Spellcasting Ability
entries: 智慧是你作为游侠法术的施法能力，因为你从与自然的联系中汲取魔法。当游侠法术提到你的施法能力时，你使用你的智慧，当你为你的游侠法术之一设置豁免 DC 或进行法术攻击检定时，你使用你的智慧修正值。

entries.name: Spellcasting Focus
entries: 你可以使用德鲁伊的焦点作为游侠法术的施法焦点。请参阅《玩家手册》中的例子。

entries.name: Ritual Casting
entries: 你对自然界的了解使你能够引出其固有的魔法。如果一个游侠法术有仪式标签，并且你已经准备好了该法术，那么你可以将该法术作为一个仪式来施放。

classFeature.name: Ranger Conclave
entries: 在3级时，你可以从以下列表中选择一个兽穴，代表了你作为游侠的训练和技能：野兽大师(Beast Master)、猎人(Hunter)、破法者(Spellbreaker)或怪物猎手(Monster Slayer)。
你选择的游侠聚落将在3级时授予你特性，并在达到7级、11级和15级时再次授予你特性。
此外，每个游侠聚会都有一个聚会法术列表，一旦你达到聚会描述中注明的游侠等级，你就会始终准备好这些法术。 你的聚会法术算作游侠法术，但它们不会计入你每天可以准备的法术总数。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到四级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或将两项能力得分提高1分。与平常一样，你不能用这个功能将你的一项能力得分提高到20分以上。
如果你的DM允许使用功法，你可以改用（%0%）。

classFeature.name: Extra Attack
entries: 从5级开始，每当你在你的回合中采取{@action Attack}行动时，你可以攻击两次，而不是一次。

classFeature.name: Ranger Conclave Feature
entries: 在第7级时，你获得了由你的游侠（Ranger）（Conclave）赋予的特性。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到8级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或将两项能力得分提高1分。与平常一样，你不能用这个功能将你的一项能力得分提高到20分以上。
如果你的DM允许使用功法，你可以改用（%0%）。

classFeature.name: Wild Expertise
entries: 在第9级时，你选择另一个你精通的游侠职业技能来获得这个特性的好处，并学会说、读和写另一种你选择的语言。

classFeature.name: Tireless
entries: 你总是准备好进行下一次狩猎，从不让敌人休息。从11级开始，每当你完成短暂休息或长休息时，你会重新获得所有已使用的游侠猎物（Ranger's Quarry）次数。

classFeature.name: Ranger Conclave Feature
entries: 在11级时，你获得了由你的游侠圣域(Ranger Conclave)赋予的特性。

classFeature.name: Adaptable
entries: 你总是准备好进行下一次狩猎，从不让敌人休息。从11级开始，每当你完成短暂休息或长休息时，你会重新获得所有已使用的游侠猎物（Ranger's Quarry）次数。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到12级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或将两项能力得分提高1分。
如果你的DM允许使用功法，你可以改用（%0%）。

classFeature.name: Ranger Conclave Feature
entries: 在15级时，你获得了由你的游侠（Ranger）专精赋予的特性。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到16级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或将两项能力得分提高1分。
如果你的DM允许使用功法，你可以改用（%0%）。

classFeature.name: Feral Senses
entries: 你猎杀时展现出顶级捕食者的技能。在5级时，你对猎物进行攻击时不会受到劣势影响。
当你达到18级时，你在30英尺内对任何目标进行攻击骰时不会有劣势。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到19级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或将两项能力得分提高1分。与平常一样，你不能用这个功能将你的一项能力得分提高到20分以上。
如果你的DM允许使用功法，你可以改用（%0%）。

classFeature.name: Foe Slayer
entries: 你是一个神话般技艺的游侠，可以与传说中的伟大猎人相媲美。在20级时，每当你用武器攻击击中你的猎物时，你可以立即结束标记，并使该攻击造成最大伤害而不是进行投掷骰子。如果这次攻击将生物的生命值降低到50点或更少，它必须根据你的法术豁免 DC 进行一次体质豁免检定，否则立即降为0点生命值。

subclass.name: Swarm Keeper
subclassFeatures: One with the Swarm|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|Swarm Keeper|LLAR|15

subclassFeature.name: Beast Master
entries: 一些与自然建立深厚联系的游侠被称为原始兽灵（Primal Beasts）所青睐。原始兽灵会与他们的伙伴并肩作战，改变形态以迎接面临的挑战。

subclassFeature.name: Beast Master Spells
entries: {@i 3rd-level Beast Master feature}
一旦你达到这个职业的特定等级，你总是准备下表中的法术。查看游侠（Ranger）专业领域（Conclave）类特性，了解专业领域法术的使用方式。

subclassFeature.name: Primal Beast
entries: {@i 3rd-level Beast Master feature}

3级 野兽大师派特性 你已经与原始野兽建立了联系。你可以从以下选项中选择它的属性块：{@creature Beast of the Cave|LLAR}，{@creature Beast of the Land|LLAR}，{@creature Beast of the Sea|LLAR}，或{@creature Beast of the Sky|LLAR}，每个选项的详细信息在接下来的页面中。原始野兽的属性块使用你的熟练加值（PB）和游侠法术豁免 DC。
你的原始兽对你和你的盟友友好，并且遵从你的命令。在战斗中，它会在你的回合行动。它可以自行移动并使用反应，但除非你使用一个额外动作命令它执行其属性块中的动作或其他动作，否则它只会采取躲避动作。每当你进行攻击动作时，你可以放弃一次攻击来命令你的兽进行攻击。当你无法行动时，你的兽可以自行行动，并利用自己的回合来保护自己和你，尽其所能。
如果你的野兽生命值降至0点，它会像玩家角色一样进行死亡豁免投掷。如果野兽死亡，你可以进行一个特殊的1小时仪式，可以在短暂休息或长休息期间进行，将你的原始野兽复活，生命值为1点。作为这个仪式的一部分，野兽可以消耗生命骰来恢复额外的生命值。它还可以选择一个新的原始野兽属性块和外观。

subclassFeature.name: Wild Empathy
entries: {@i 3rd-level Beast Master feature}
你与野兽有着深厚的联系。你获得了野性洞察I（Wild Insight I）技能，但它不计入你已知的技能数量。如果你已经知道这个技能，你可以学习另一个你选择的技能。

subclassFeature.name: Bestial Focus
entries: {@i 7th-level Beast Master feature}
你和你的野兽一起狩猎。你的原始野兽获得你游侠猎物的所有好处，包括任何增强它的技能，它的攻击被视为魔法攻击，以克服对非魔法攻击的抵抗和免疫。

subclassFeature.name: Exceptional Training
entries: {@i 11th-level Beast Master feature}
你能够激发出原始兽的全部凶猛力量。每回合一次，当你命令你的原始兽使用其属性块中的攻击之一时，它可以进行两次攻击。

subclassFeature.name: Primal Bond
entries: {@i 15th-level Beast Master feature}
你与你的原始兽达到了巅峰。当你施放一个以自己为目标的游侠法术时，只要你的兽在你的30英尺内，它也会获得相同的好处。

subclassFeature.name: Hunter
entries: 游侠们就像他们所来自的土地一样多样化。有些利用他们对荒野的了解成为向导和自然主义者。其他人利用他们的技能成为追踪者或贸易商。有些人漫游乡间，而另一些人则站在神圣森林的守护者身份。尽管他们扮演着各种角色，但每个游侠内心深处都有一颗猎人的心。
成群结队的半兽人、卑鄙的巨魔、伟大而可怕的龙，或伟大的野兽，对真正的猎人来说都不重要。他们总能找到办法来战胜他们的猎物。

subclassFeature.name: Hunter Spells
entries: {@i 3rd-level Hunter feature}
一旦你达到这个职业的特定等级，你总是准备下表中的法术。查看游侠（Ranger）专业领域（Conclave）类特性，了解专业领域法术的使用方式。

entries.caption: Hunter Spells
rows: {@spell Cordon of Arrows (Alternate)|LLAR}, {@spell Pass without Trace (Alternate)|LLAR}

subclassFeature.name: Ambuscade
entries: {@i 3rd-level Hunter feature}
你总是准备好第一个出手，经常能够在选择的猎物身上占据先机。当你进行先攻骰时，只要你没有被吓到，你可以使用你的反应来进行躲藏动作，攻击动作，或者将一只生物标记为你的猎物。
如果你感到惊讶，你不能采取这个特殊反应，但是你可以在战斗的第一个回合表现正常。

subclassFeature.name: Silent Steps
entries: {@i 3rd-level Hunter feature}
你悄无声息地跟踪猎物，直到太迟为止。你学会了（Stalker I）技能，但它不计入你已知的技能数量。如果你已经掌握了这个技能，你可以选择学习另一个技能。

subclassFeature.name: Cunning Parry
entries: {@i 7th-level Hunter feature}
你坚定的专注让你能够招架并反击敌人的攻击。当你的猎物（Quarry）以你能看见的攻击你时，你可以使用你的反应，在那次攻击中将你的智力调整值（最低+1）加到你的防御等级上。
如果这使攻击未命中，你可以作为同一反应的一部分对你的猎物进行一次武器攻击。

subclassFeature.name: Relentless Hunter
entries: {@i 7th-level Hunter feature}
你是无情的，追踪你选择的敌人直到他们全部被消灭。当你的猎物被杀死时，你可以将另一个你能看到的生物标记为你的猎物（不需要行动），而无需消耗猎人猎物或法术位。

subclassFeature.name: Horde Breaker
entries: {@i 11th-level Hunter feature}
你能像割草一样轻松地剿灭你选择的猎物。你获得以下列出的特性，每个特性都可以在你的每个回合中用作一个动作。你必须装备正确的武器才能使用相应的特性：

entries.name: Volley
entries: 选择你可以看到的距离你所持远程武器的正常范围内的一个点。你可以对距离那个点不超过10英尺的生物进行远程武器攻击。你必须为每个目标准备弹药，并且必须像平常一样分别进行攻击骰投掷。

entries.name: Whirlwind
entries: 你对你所持的近战武器攻击任意数量的生物，每个生物都需要进行单独的攻击检定。

subclassFeature.name: Ruthless Focus
entries: {@i 15th-level Hunter feature}
你的致命技能不逊色于传说和神话中伟大的猎人。你在攻击你的猎物时，可以将你的智慧调整值（最低为+1）加到所有的武器攻击检定中。

subclassFeature.name: Spellbreaker
entries: 破法者是一群小而专注的游侠同盟，他们专门追捕那些将奥术力量用于邪恶目的的法师。虽然大多数人选择成为破法者是出于高尚的理由，但也有一些人试图摧毁任何有可能使用魔法的人。大多数破法者都在秘密中工作，只有在成功的把握时才会出手。在一举一动可能导致灭绝的情况下，绝对不能出现错误的余地。

subclassFeature.name: Spellbreaker Spells
entries: {@i 3rd-level Spellbreaker feature}
一旦你达到这个职业的特定等级，你总是准备下表中的法术。查看游侠（Ranger）专业领域（Conclave）类特性，了解专业领域法术的使用方式。

entries.caption: Spellbreaker Spells
rows: {@spell dispel evil and good}, {@spell wall of force}

subclassFeature.name: Spellsight
entries: {@i 3rd-level Spellbreaker feature}
你学会了看到生物身上的奥术潜能。当你将一只生物标记为你的猎物时，你立刻了解它的施法能力（如果有的话）以及它能够施放的最高等级法术的等级。
如果你的猎物被占卜魔法隐藏，比如通过{@spell nondetection}法术，它看起来好像无法施放法术。

subclassFeature.name: Mage Breaker
entries: {@i 3rd-level Spellbreaker feature}
你用反魔法附魔来保护你的武器。当你用武器攻击击中你的猎物时，它在维持对法术的专注时的体质豁免检定会受到劣势。
此外，每当你看到或听到一个在你的攻击范围内的生物试图施放一个法术时，你可以使用你的反应对其发动一次机会攻击。

subclassFeature.name: Arcane Defense
entries: {@i 7th-level Spellbreaker feature}
你可以坚定自己，更好地抵抗敌人的魔法。每当你的猎物(Quarry)迫使你进行豁免检定以抵抗法术或其他魔法效果时，你获得一个加值等于你的感知修正值的奖励（最低为+1）。
此外，每当你的猎物让你进行豁免投掷以仅受到一半伤害的法术或魔法效果时，你在成功投掷时不受伤害，在失败投掷时只受到一半伤害。

subclassFeature.name: Spellbane
entries: {@i 11th-level Spellbreaker feature}
你是无与伦比的法师猎手。每当你用武器攻击击中你的猎物时，你可以消耗一个1级或更高级别的法术位，额外造成等于法术位等级的猎物骰的伤害。
此外，每当你施放反咒术或驱散魔法时，你可以将你的猎物骰（Quarry Die）的点数加到技能检定中。

subclassFeature.name: Mantle of the Master
entries: {@i 15th-level Spellbreaker feature}
你作为一名破咒者的训练已经达到了巅峰。你对所有来自咒语和其他魔法效果的伤害具有抗性。

subclassFeature.name: Reflect Spell
entries: {@i 15th-level Spellbreaker feature}
你的训练使你能够从魔网中释放法术。你可以随意施放{@spell absorb elements|xge}，就好像你以1级施放它一样。
在你施放吸收元素后，如果你下一次近战武器攻击的目标是你吸收法术的生物，你将把吸收元素的伤害视为其最大值。

subclassFeature.name: Monster Slayer
entries: 每个文化都讲述着生活在文明墙外的邪恶精灵和怪物的故事。多亏了专注的护林者的悄无声息的警惕，这些可怕的怪物仅仅只是一个故事。这些守护者护林者担负起怪物杀手的责任，誓言保护无辜者免受夜间的威胁。他们追踪吸血鬼、邪恶精灵、恶灵、狼人和其他邪恶生物，并毫不犹豫地摧毁它们。

entries.subclassFeature: Knowledge of the Hunt|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|Monster Slayer|LLAR|3

subclassFeature.name: Monster Slayer Spells
entries: {@i 3rd-level Monster Slayer feature}
一旦你达到这个职业的特定等级，你总是准备下表中的法术。查看游侠（Ranger）专业领域（Conclave）类特性，了解专业领域法术的使用方式。

entries.caption: Monster Slayer Spells
rows: {@spell bane}, {@spell protection from evil and good}
{@spell dispel evil and good}, {@spell hold monster}

subclassFeature.name: Knowledge of the Hunt
entries: {@i 3rd-level Monster Slayer feature}
你已经致力于摧毁黑暗生物，并研究它们的弱点。你在以下技能中选择一项获得熟练加值：奥术学（Arcana）、自然学（Nature）或宗教学（Religion）。
作为一个奖励动作，你可以分析一个你能看到的距离30英尺内的生物，使用下面对应其生物类型的技能进行一次能力检定（DC等于10 + 其CR）：

entries.caption: Knowledge of the Hunt
rows: 异常生物, 龙类, 畸变体
野兽、元素生物、软泥怪、植物
天神, 仙灵, 邪恶生物, 不死生物

entries: 成功检定后，你可以选择了解以下其中一个特征：它的最高属性分数，最低属性分数，伤害易受性，伤害抗性或免疫性，状态免疫性，或者它可能有的其他弱点。如果你选择的特征不适用，DM会向你透露另一个特征。
如果你使用这个特性分析你的猎物，你可以将一个猎物骰子的点数加到你的能力检定中。

subclassFeature.name: Slayer's Cunning
entries: {@i 3rd-level Monster Slayer feature}
你总是准备好去猎杀世界上的巨兽。你获得猎杀者I技能，但它不计入你已知技能的总数。
你也可以在每次短休或长休之间使用游侠的矿石一次，而不消耗它的使用次数。

subclassFeature.name: Iron Focus
entries: {@i 7th-level Monster Slayer feature}
你已经训练好你的思维，更好地抵抗你所憎恨敌人的超自然攻击。每当你的(Quarry)迫使你进行能力检定或豁免检定时，你的检定获得一个额外加值，数值等同于你的(Quarry Die)掷骰结果。

subclassFeature.name: Monster's Nemesis
entries: {@i 11th-level Monster Slayer feature}
Your hatred for evil empowers your weapons. Your weapon attacks against your Quarry treat its damage immunities as resistances, and ignore any damage resistances it has.
Moreover, when your Quarry misses you with an attack or you succeed on a saving throw it forced you to make, you can use your reaction to make a single weapon attack against it.

subclassFeature.name: Ruthless Counter
entries: {@i 15th-level Monster Slayer feature}

You do everything in your power to prevent the monsters you hunt from harming the innocent. When you see your Quarry attempt to cast a spell, teleport, or use another supernatural or magical ability from its stat block, you can make a single weapon attack against it as a reaction. On hit, your Quarry must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw against your Spell save DC, or its spell, teleport, or other ability is thwarted and fails to take effect.
When you use this feature and your attack hits, you can choose to instantly end the effects of Ranger's Quarry to cause the creautre to automatically fail its Wisdom saving throw.

subclassFeature.name: Deep Stalker
entries: Deep Stalkers are at home in the darkest places: deep under the earth, in gloomy alleyways, in primeval forests, and wherever else the light dims. Most folk enter such places with trepidation, but a Deep Stalker ventures boldly into the darkness, seeking to ambush threats before they can reach the broader world. Such rangers are often found in the Underdark, but they will go any place where evil lurks in the shadows. The full subclass is found in Xanathar's Guide to Everything.

subclassFeature.name: Deep Stalker Spells
entries: 一旦你达到这个职业的特定等级，你总是准备下表中的法术。查看游侠（Ranger）专业领域（Conclave）类特性，了解专业领域法术的使用方式。

subclassFeature.name: Dread Ambusher
entries: You mimic the surprise tactics of the nameless creatures that dwell in the darkness. You gain a bonus to your initiative rolls equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of +1), so long as you are not surprised or incapacitated.
Also, when you take the Attack action during your first turn in combat, you can make one additional attack as part of that action. On hit, it deals bonus damage equal to your level.

subclassFeature.name: Umbral Sight
entries: You have adapted to stalk your prey without light. You gain darkvision out to a range of 60 feet. If you already have darkvision from another feature, the range of your darkvision increases by 30 feet.

subclassFeature.name: Cloak of Shadows
entries: You have learned to conceal yourself even from the creatures native to the deep shadow. While you are in darkness, you are invisible to creatures that rely on darkvision to see you.

subclassFeature.name: Iron Mind
entries: You have trained your mind to resist the mental assaults that are common in the depths you stalk. You gain proficiency in Wisdom saving throws. If you are already proficient, you gain proficiency in either Intelligence or Charisma saving throws.

subclassFeature.name: Precise Strikes
entries: In the unforgiving dark every strike could be the difference between life and death. Once per turn when you miss with a weapon attack, you can add one roll of your Quarry Die to your attack roll, possibly turning your miss into a hit.
In addition, your darkvision has improved, and allows you to see through both magical and nonmagical darkness.

subclassFeature.name: Deadly Counter
entries: You can manipulate the shadows to distract your foes. When a creature you can see targets you with an attack roll, you can use your reaction to cloak yourself in shadows and impose disadvantage on its attack roll.

If this reaction causes the attack to miss, you can make a weapon attack against your attacker as part of the same reaction. If you are in dim light or darkness when you make this special attack, you have advantage on your attack roll.

subclassFeature.name: Planar Warden
entries: 保卫你的家园，抵御来自外域的入侵和威胁！完整的子职业内容可在《(Xanathar's Guide to Everything)》中找到。

subclassFeature.name: Planar Warden Spells
entries: 一旦你达到这个职业的特定等级，你总是准备下表中的法术。查看游侠（Ranger）专业领域（Conclave）类特性，了解专业领域法术的使用方式。

entries.caption: Planar Warden Spells
rows: {@spell alarm}, {@spell protection from evil and good}

subclassFeature.name: Extraplanar Senses
entries: As an action, you can detect the exact distance and direction of the nearest creature alien to your current plane or planar portal within 1 mile that isn't shielded from divination magic. As part of this action you can exclude targets of your choice.
Once you use this feature you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again. If you have no uses, you can expend a spell slot of 1st-level or higher to use this again.

subclassFeature.name: Planar Warrior
entries: You can augment your strikes with extraplanar energies. You can choose for the additional damage of Ranger's Quarry to be force damage in place of your weapon's damage type.

Moreover, you can mark any creatures not native to your current plane of existence as your Quarry without expending a use of Ranger's Quarry. For example, while you are on the material plane, you can use this feature to mark aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, and fiends, as your Quarry.

subclassFeature.name: Ethereal Step
entries: You can briefly move between planes to disorient your foes. When you take the Attack action, you can teleport up to 10 feet before each attack to an unoccupied space you can see.
Any distance you teleport with this feature counts against your total movement for your turn.

subclassFeature.name: Empowered Strikes
entries: Your ability to move between the planes has improved. If you use Ethereal Step and attack at least two different creatures with that action, you can make one additional attack as part of that Attack action against a third creature.
In addition, when you use Ethereal Step and then make an attack, you can choose for your attack to deal force damage.

subclassFeature.name: Ethereal Defense
entries: You can partially phase out of your current plane to resist the assaults of your foes. When you take damage from an attack or spell that you can see, you can use your reaction to grant yourself resistance to the damage of that attack for this turn.

subclassFeature.name: Fey Wanderer
entries: 借助Feywild的力量追逐和迷惑敌人！完整的子职业内容可在《塔莎的万事屋》中找到。

subclassFeature.name: Fey Wanderer Spells
entries: {@i 3rd-level Fey Wanderer feature}
一旦你达到这个职业的特定等级，你总是准备下表中的法术。查看游侠（Ranger）专业领域（Conclave）类特性，了解专业领域法术的使用方式。

subclassFeature.name: Beguiling Strikes
entries: You can weave the wild and disorienting magic of the Feywild into your strikes, distracting and taunting your foes. You can choose for the bonus damage of your Ranger's Quarry feature to be psychic instead of your weapon's noraml damage type.
If you deal psychic damage to your Quarry with a melee weapon attack, it has disadvantage on all attack rolls against creatures other than you until the start of your next turn.

subclassFeature.name: Otherworldly Mystique
entries: The magic of the Feywild has imbued you with a whimsical charm that makes others more likely to trust you, for good or ill. You gain proficiency in one of the following skills of your choice: Deception, Performance, or Persuasion.
Also, whenever you make a Charisma check, you gain a bonus to the roll equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of +1).

subclassFeature.name: Whimsical Ward
entries: Your familiarity with the abilities of the fey grants you increased defenses against their power. You have advantage on saving throws to resist being charmed and frightened.

Also, when a creature you can see within 30 feet makes a saving throw to resist the charmed or frightened condition, you can use a reaction to force another creature you can see within 60 feet to make a Wisdom saving throw against your Spell save DC. On a failure, it is either charmed or frightened of you (your choice) for 1 minute. The creature can repeat this saving at the end of each of its turns, ending this effect on a successful save.

subclassFeature.name: Faerie Guardian
entries: You can call support from the otherworldly courts of the fey. You can cast {@spell summon fey|tce} without its material components.
Also, once per long rest, when you cast summon fey, you can cast it so that it does not require concentration. When you do, its duration is reduced from 1 hour to 1 minute.

subclassFeature.name: Mirthful Step
entries: You can step through the Feywild to move quickly from one place to another. You can cast {@spell misty step} a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of once), and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.
When you cast misty step, you can touch a willing creature within 5 feet and teleport it along with you. It reappears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of where you reappear.

subclassFeature.name: Swarm Keeper
entries: Feeling a deep connection to the environment around them, some rangers reach out through their magical connection to the world and bond with a swarm of nature spirits. The swarm becomes a potent force in battle, as well as helpful company for the ranger. Some Swarm Keepers are outcasts or hermits, keeping to themselves and their attendant swarms rather than dealing with the discomfort of others. Other Swarm Keepers enjoy building vibrant communities that work for the mutual benefit of all those they consider part of their swarm.

subclassFeature.name: Swarm Keeper Spells
entries: {@i 3rd-level Swarm Keeper feature}
You always have certain spells prepared at the Ranger levels in the table below. The spells count as Ranger spells for you, but they don't count against the spells you prepare each day.

subclassFeature.name: Symbiotic Swarm
entries: You have become an integral part of a swarm of vermin. You know the mage hand cantrip, but when you cast mage hand, it manifests as part of your swarm which does your bidding.
Also, you can use a bonus action on each of your turns to command your swarm in one of the following ways:

entries.name: Biting Assault
entries: One creature of your choice within 30 feet must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take piercing or poison damage equal to two rolls of your Quarry Die.

entries.name: Harrying Horde
entries: One creature of your choice within 30 feet must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be moved up to 15 feet in a direction of your choice. Large and larger creatures have advantage on this Strength saving throw.

entries.name: Swarm Step
entries: You are moved up to 15 feet in a direction of your choice without provoking opportunity attacks.

subclassFeature.name: Writhing Horde
entries: You can compel your swarm to carry you in unnatural ways. You gain a climbing speed equal to your walking speed, and you can climb sheer surfaces and upside down on ceilings without having to make an ability check. While climbing in this way, you are surrounded by your swarm of vermin.
Also, when you make a Strength (Athletics) check to shove or grapple, or to resist or end a grapple, you can call on your swarm and add one roll of your Quarry Die to your roll.

subclassFeature.name: Greater Swarm
entries: Your swarm has grown vastly in both numbers and in power. Your Quarry has disadvantage on saving throws against your Symbiotic Swarm features. Your Symbiotic Swarm features also gain the following additional benefits:

entries.name: Biting Assault
entries: On a failed save, the creature is poisoned until the start of your next turn in addition to the damage.

entries.name: Harrying Horde
entries: On a failed save, the creature is knocked prone at the end of this forced movement.

entries.name: Swarm Step
entries: After you move, you also gain the benefits of half cover until the beginning of your next turn.

subclassFeature.name: One with the Swarm
entries: You can fade into your swarm to avoid danger. When you take damage from a source you can see, you can use your reaction to become one with your swarm and give yourself resistance to that instance of damage. You and your swarm then teleport to an unoccupied space you can see within 30 feet.

You can use this special reaction a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of once), and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest. If you have no uses left, you can expend a spell slot of 1st-level or higher to use this special reaction again.

subclassFeature.name: Swarm Master
entries: You have become one with your swarm, and can command it with only your mind. You can cast one of your Swarm Keeper Spells without expending a spell slot or requiring the normal components, instead relying on your swarm to produce it.
Once you use this feature to cast a Swarm Keeper Spell in this way, you must finish a short or long rest before you can call on your swarm in this way again.

subclassFeature.name: Drake Guard
entries: 你与自然界的联系以龙类精灵的形式呈现，它可以在物理形态中显现为一只幼龙。随着你的力量增长，你的幼龙也会成长，从一个小小的四腿伴侣蜕变为一只雄伟有力、足够你骑乘的巨大有翼生物。在这过程中，你会逐渐获得越来越多令人敬畏的龙类力量。

subclassFeature.name: Drake Guard Spells
entries: {@i 3rd-level Drake Guard feature}
一旦你达到这个职业的特定等级，你总是准备下表中的法术。查看游侠（Ranger）专业领域（Conclave）类特性，了解专业领域法术的使用方式。

subclassFeature.name: Draconic Companion
entries: Your soul has been bound to that of a Draconic Companion. You choose its Essence from the following options: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison. Its Essence influences the color of its scales, and once it is chosen it cannot be changed.
Your Companion uses the Draconic Companion stat block on this page, which uses your proficiency bonus (PB) and Ranger Spell save DC throughout. It cannot bear a rider.

Your Draconic Companion is friendly to you and your allies and it obeys your commands. In combat, it acts on your turn. It can move and use its reaction on its own, but it only takes the Dodge action on its turn unless you use a bonus action to order it to take an action from its stat block or another action. Also, whenever you take the attack action, you can forgo one of your attacks to command the Companion to attack. When you are incapacitated, your Companion acts on its own, and will to defend both itself and you to the best of its ability.

When your Companion is reduced to 0 hit points, it makes death saving throws like a player character would. If it dies, you can perform a special 1-hour ritual, which can be during a short or long rest, that restores it to life with 1 hit point. As part of this ritual, it can expend hit dice to regain hit points.

subclassFeature.name: Wyrmsoul
entries: {@i 3rd-level Beast Master feature}

The magic that bonds you to your Companion has infused you with draconic power. You learn to speak, read, and write Draconic, and when you cast a Ranger spell that deals acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison damage, you can cause it to deal the damage type of your Companion's Essence instead.

subclassFeature.name: Greater Companion
entries: As your power increases, so does that of your Companion. Your Companion becomes Medium in size, and can bear you as a rider so long as you are Medium or smaller. However, its flying speed is halved while you are riding it. You can also roll d6s, in place of d4s, for the damage of its Claw attacks.

subclassFeature.name: Elemental Breath
entries: {@i 11th-level Drake Guard feature}

You and your Companion can directly channel the elemental power of its Essence. As an action, you, or your Companion, can exhale a 30-foot cone of elemental breath. Creatures in that area must make a Dexterity saving throw against your Ranger Spell save DC. Creatures take 8d6 Essence damage on a failed save, and half as much damage on a success.

You and your Companion can use this feature a combined number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (a minimum of once), and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest. When you have no uses left, you can expend a spell slot of 3rd-level or higher to use this feature again.

subclassFeature.name: Mythic Companion
entries: {@i 15th-level Drake Guard feature}

Your bond with your Companion has unlocked its true power. As an action, your Companion can change its size, choosing to be Small, Medium, or Large. If it is Large in size, its flying speed is no longer halved while it bears you as its rider.
Also, once per turn when you command your Companion to attack, it can make two attacks instead of one. Finally, the damage of Elemental Breath increases to 10d6 damage.

subclassFeature.name: Bounty Hunter
entries: 赏金猎人保护人类免受其害。他们接受过在城市和城镇中狩猎的训练，可以在任何城镇的黑暗小巷和地下追踪他们的猎物。接受过使用各种武术技巧的训练，这些游骑兵可以自信地对抗和制服任何危险的人形生物。

entries.subclassFeature: Ear to the Ground|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|Bounty Hunter|LLAR:E|3

subclassFeature.name: Ear to the Ground
entries: {@i 3rd-level Bounty Hunter feature}

Your line of work has granted you a unique familiarity with the underbelly of civilization. After you complete a long rest in a settlement, you have advantage on all ability checks to gather information on its contacts, factions, or underworld.

subclassFeature.name: Martial Exploits
entries: {@i 3rd-level Bounty Hunter feature}
你已经研究了各种武术技巧，以更好地对付人形敌人。在3级时，你获得以下特征。

entries.name: Exploits
entries: 你可以从可供选择的替代战士技能中学习两个{@filter Exploits|optionalfeatures|feature type=ll:1de;ll:me=u~u~sand}。每次能力检定、攻击或豁免检定只能使用一个技能。当你获得一个游侠等级时，你可以用另一个你选择的技能替换其中一个技能。

entries.name: Exploit Dice
entries: 赏金猎人利用表格显示你有多少利用骰来使用技能。要使用一个技能，你需要消耗一个利用骰，当你完成短暂休息或长休息时，你会恢复所有已消耗的利用骰。

entries.name: High Degree
entries: 你的游侠等级限制了你能够执行的技巧性行动。这个限制体现在《赏金猎人行动》表格的高度栏中。

entries.name: Saving Throws
entries: 如果一个Exploit需要生物进行豁免检定，那么豁免检定 DC 的计算方法如下：

entries.name: Multiclassing and Exploits
entries: 你的武技部分取决于你在学习Exploits的职业中的综合等级，部分取决于你在每个职业中的个别等级。如果你的团队使用多职业的可选规则，并且你从多个职业中学习Exploits，你将使用以下规则：https://www.gmbinder.com/share/-NGUL51kfZCPlESxL1wq

subclassFeature.name: Cunning Technique
entries: {@i 7th-level Bounty Hunter feature}

Your martial skills are especially potent when used against your chosen foe. Once per turn, when you force your Quarry to make a saving throw to resist the effects of an Exploit, you can force it to make its saving throw with disadvantage.
You also learn to identify, read, and speak in Thieves' Cant.

subclassFeature.name: Improved Exploits (d6)
entries: {@i 7th-level Bounty Hunter feature}
你的技能得到提升。当你达到7级时，你会获得额外的一个Exploit骰，你的Exploit骰变成{@dice d6}s。你也可以学习{@filter 2nd degree Exploits|optionalfeatures|feature type=ll:2de;ll:me=u~u~sand}。

subclassFeature.name: Unwavering
entries: {@i 11th-level Bounty Hunter feature}

You are a master of disabling foes. When your Quarry misses you with a melee attack, you can force it to make a Dexterity saving throw against your Exploit Save DC as a reaction. On a failure, it suffers one of the following effects of your choice:

items: You can knock it prone if it is Large or smaller.
You can automatically grapple it if you have a free hand.
You can make a single melee weapon attack against it.

subclassFeature.name: Improved Exploits (d8)
entries: {@i 15th-level Bounty Hunter feature}
在15级时，你的技能进一步增强。你获得另一个利用骰（总共四个），你的利用骰变为{@dice d8}s。你还可以学习{@filter 3rd degree Exploits|optionalfeatures|feature type=ll:3de;ll:me=u~u~sand}。

subclassFeature.name: Most Dangerous Game
entries: {@i 15th-level Bounty Hunter feature}

Your nearly supernatural instincts allow you to predict your enemy's attacks. Once per turn when you take damage from your Quarry, you can reduce the damage you would take by one roll of your Quarry Die.

subclassFeature.name: Buccaneer
entries: {@i 3rd-level Buccaneer feature}
结合他们的生存技能、对自然魔法的亲和力以及对大海的热情，(Buccaneers) 海盗是游侠，他们在水上比在陆地上更感到自在。作为水手、海盗、海军陆战队员或私掠船船员，他们常常是船上最有价值的船员之一。你是如何来到海上航行的？是被一位海盗船长强迫加入船员，还是你发誓要杀死某种特定的海怪？

subclassFeature.name: Buccaneer Spells
entries: {@i 3rd-level Buccaneer feature}
一旦你达到这个职业的特定等级，你总是准备下表中的法术。查看游侠（Ranger）专业领域（Conclave）类特性，了解专业领域法术的使用方式。

subclassFeature.name: Sea Legs
entries: {@i 3rd-level Buccaneer feature}
你在海上度过的时间赋予了你陆地游侠所缺乏的能力。你获得以下好处：

items: 你获得了航海家格斗风格(Mariner Fighting Style)。如果你已经掌握了这种格斗风格，你可以学习游侠职业可用的另一种格斗风格。
You learn the Aquatic Adept Knack, but it doesn't count against your total Knacks Known. If you already know this Knack you learn another Knack of your choice.
Whenever you make a Wisdom (Perception) check that relies on your sense of sight, you gain a bonus to your roll equal to one roll of your Quarry Die.

subclassFeature.name: Windswept Hide
entries: {@i 7th-level Buccaneer feature}

Your experience has granted you increased resistance to the dangers of the sea. You gain resistance to cold, lightning, and thunder damage. Whenever you make an ability check or saving throw to resist being knocked prone or moved against your will, you add one roll of your Quarry Die to your roll.

subclassFeature.name: Wrath of the Sea
entries: {@i 11th-level Buccaneer feature}

You carry the magic of the high seas whether you are on sea or land. Once per turn when you hit a creature with a weapon attack, you can imbue the strike with watery magic, forcing it to make a Strength saving throw against your Spell save DC. On a failed save, it takes cold damage equal to a roll of your Quarry Die and is knocked back 10 feet in a straight line.

subclassFeature.name: Watery Resilience
entries: {@i 15th-level Buccaneer feature}
When a creature you can see hits you with an attack, you can use a reaction to temporarily take on a watery form, halving the damage you would take from the triggering attack.
As part of this reaction, you can also move up to 10 feet without provoking opportunity attacks.

subclassFeature.name: Shifter
entries: {@i 3rd-level Shifter feature}

While most Rangers stand with one foot in the wild and one in the civilized world, some side firmly with the natural world. When cities and settlements encroach on ancient groves and wild forests, the Rangers known as Shifters stand as defenders of the wild. Drawing upon primeval magic, these warriors use the power of nature to defend their homes.

subclassFeature.name: Shifter Spells
entries: {@i 3rd-level Shifter feature}
一旦你达到这个职业的特定等级，你总是准备下表中的法术。查看游侠（Ranger）专业领域（Conclave）类特性，了解专业领域法术的使用方式。

subclassFeature.name: Limited Wild Shape
entries: {@i 3rd-level Shifter feature}

You can draw on primal nature magic to take the shape of beasts, much like a Druid does. You gain the ability to Wild Shape. As a bonus action on your turn, you can use this ability to assume the form of any beast that you have physically touched while it was living.

Your Ranger level determines the maximum CR of the beasts that you can transform into, as shown in the table below. You must obey all the other rules for Wild Shape as they are detailed in Druid's Wild Shape feature in the Player's Handbook. See the table below:

rows: 没有飞行或游泳速度 (No Flying or Swimming Speed)

entries: 你可以保持野兽形态长达一小时，之后你会恢复成正常形态。你可以在此之前使用一个奖励动作来恢复成正常形态，或者如果你失去意识、生命值降至0，或者死亡时也会恢复成正常形态。
一旦你使用了你的野性变身，你必须完成一次短休或长休才能再次使用它，除非你消耗一个1级或更高级的法术位来再次使用野性变身。

subclassFeature.name: Wild Empathy
entries: {@i 3rd-level Shifter feature}

The nature magic you wield enables a bond with the beasts you defend. You learn the Wild Insight I Knack, but it does not count against your total number of Knacks Known. If you already know Wild Insight I, you instead learn another Knack of your choice that you meet the prerequisites for.

subclassFeature.name: Druidic Soul
entries: {@i 7th-level Shifter feature}

The primal power you channel grants you the abilities of a true Druid. You learn to speak Druidic, and you can use it to decode and leave hidden messages for other Druids. You also count as a Druid for the purposes of attuning to magic items.
Finally, your Wild Shape form's attacks count as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistances and immunities.

subclassFeature.name: Empowered Shapes
entries: {@i 11th-level Shifter feature}

You can infuse your Wild Shape transformation with primal magic. As part of the bonus action you use to Wild Shape, you can expend a spell slot of 1st-level or higher to exceed the normal CR limitations of Wild Shape. When you do so, you can transform into a beast with a CR equal to or lower than the level of the spell slot you expended to transform.
Once you use this feature you must finish a short or long rest before you can empower Wild Shape in this way again.
Moreover, you can roll your Quarry Die for the damage die of your Wild Shape form attacks unless the form's is higher.

subclassFeature.name: Thousand Forms
entries: {@i 15th-level Shifter feature}
你与自己的能力如此契合，以至于可以随意微妙地改变形态。你可以随意施放{@spell alter self}，只能以自己为目标，而无需消耗法术位。

subclassFeature.name: Wastelander
entries: {@i 3rd-level Wastelander feature}

While all Rangers have the skills necessary to live out in the wilderness, those known as Wastelanders are the true masters of survival. These rugged wanderers have adapted to live in the harshest lands imaginable; arid deserts, frozen tundra, great alpine heights, and magical wastelands. These survivalists combine a talent for illusion magic and protective gear to survive in all but the most extreme hostile conditions.

subclassFeature.name: Wastelander Spells
entries: {@i 3rd-level Wastelander feature}
一旦你达到这个职业的特定等级，你总是准备下表中的法术。查看游侠（Ranger）专业领域（Conclave）类特性，了解专业领域法术的使用方式。

subclassFeature.name: Wilderness Adept
entries: {@i 3rd-level Wastelander feature}

You are able to survive the most inhospitable environments. You learn one of the following Knacks of your choice: Alpine Adept, Aquatic Adept, Arctic Adept, Desert Adept, or Jungle Adept. You learn another at 7th, 11th, and 15th levels.
Starting at 7th level, you can choose Planar Adept as the Knack you learn from this feature. The Knacks you gain this way do not count against your number of Knacks Known.

subclassFeature.name: Wasteland Weaver
entries: {@i 3rd-level Wastelander feature}
你掌握了一种古老的编织和增强服装的技艺，穿上后能够获得接近超自然的生存能力。你获得{@item weaver's tools|phb}的熟练加成，而且在使用编织工具进行检定时，你可以额外添加双倍的熟练加成。
在每次长休结束时，你可以使用编织者工具来增强一套衣物或披风。当生物穿着这件增强过的服装时，它会获得以下好处：

items: It gains a bonus to Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks to hide in wasteland and wilderness equal to your Quarry die.
为了生存，它只需要四分之一的水。
在抵抗恶劣环境影响和随后的疲劳等级时，具有优势。

entries: 在每次长休期间，你必须花时间维护你已经强化的服装，否则它们将失去任何有益的属性。你可以维护的强化服装总数等于你的感知调整值（最少为1）。

entries.name: Elemental Wastelands
entries: While most Wastelanders hail from the deserts of the material plane, it is not unheard of for them to come from the chaotic inner planes. Some high-level Wastelanders call the harsh elemental planes of air, earth, fire, and water home.

subclassFeature.name: Rugged Resilience
entries: {@i 7th-level Wastelander feature}
你将你强化服装的神秘编织与幻术魔法融合。穿着你强化服装的生物可以使用一个奖励动作对自己施放{@spell invisibility}。
它可以这样做三次，但当最后一次使用耗尽时，该服装将失去任何有益的属性。当你在长休期间花时间维护你的增强服装时，你的增强服装会恢复这个特性的所有使用次数。

subclassFeature.name: Illusory Strikes
entries: {@i 11th-level Wastelander feature}

You enhance your combat style with potent illusion magic. When you take the Attack action on your turn, you can use a bonus action to create an Illusory Duplicate of yourself in an unoccupied space you can see within 30 feet. It makes one attack with a duplicate of your weapon, which deals force damage in place of your weapon's damage and disappears.

subclassFeature.name: Mirage Transposition
entries: {@i 15th-level Wastelander feature}
You can use a bonus action to create your Illusory Duplicate even if you do not take the Attack action. When you conjure an Illusory Duplicate, you can instantly switch places with it.

subclassFeature.name: Grim Warden
entries: {@i 3rd-level Grim Warden feature}
有时需要一个怪物来摧毁一个怪物。接受 "狰狞守护者 "衣钵的游骑兵要经历一种黑暗的炼金术仪式，称为 "守护者之礼"，以增强他们的身体能力。他们牺牲了任何正常生活的机会，将自己的血液与怪物的血液混合在一起，以获得黑暗的、非自然的力量来摧毁他们的敌人。

subclassFeature.name: Grim Warden Spells
entries: {@i 3rd-level Grim Warden feature}
一旦你达到这个职业的特定等级，你总是准备下表中的法术。查看游侠（Ranger）专业领域（Conclave）类特性，了解专业领域法术的使用方式。

subclassFeature.name: Warden's Rite
entries: {@i 3rd-level Grim Warden feature}
You have passed through the Warden's Rite, an unholy alchemical ritual that suffuses your blood with the sinister power of monsters. You change in the ways listed below, which cannot be reversed:

items: You gain proficiency with alchemist's supplies and in Religion. Whenever you make a check with either of these, you add one roll of your Quarry Die to your result.
You count as a humanoid and monstrosity for magical purposes.
Your hit point maximum increases by 3, and increases by 1 again each time you gain a level in this class.

subclassFeature.name: Crimson Mark
entries: {@i 3rd-level Grim Warden feature}

You can use your sinister blood magic to empower the mark on your foes. Whenever you mark a creature as your Quarry, you can make a blood sacrifice instead of expending a use of Ranger's Quarry. When you do, you reduce your current and maximum hit points by one roll of your Quarry Die.
Any reductions to your maximum hit points by this feature are undone at the end of your next long rest.
For the duration, you can choose for the bonus damage of Ranger's Quarry to be necrotic. Necrotic damage dealt in this way ignores resistance and treats immunity as resistance.
Finally, when you deal necrotic damage to your Quarry in this way, it cannot regain hit points for the next minute.

subclassFeature.name: Dark Augmentation
entries: {@i 7th-level Grim Warden feature}

The sinister magic in enhances your physical capabilities. Your walking speed increases by 10 feet. Also, whenever you make a Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution ability check, you gain a bonus to your roll equal to one roll of your Quarry Die.

subclassFeature.name: Greater Crimson Mark
entries: {@i 11th-level Grim Warden feature}
每个回合一次，当你用近战武器攻击命中生物时，你可以对其造成额外{@dice 1d10}的死灵伤害。

subclassFeature.name: Sinister Resilience
entries: {@i 11th-level Grim Warden feature}

The dark magic that flows in your blood grants you defenses against evil magicks. You gain resistance to necrotic damage, and when you reduce your hit points with Crimson Mark, you roll your Quarry Die twice and use the lower result.

subclassFeature.name: Sanguine Mastery
entries: {@i 15th-level Grim Warden feature}
你的守护者仪式的魔法发挥出其全部潜力。你在豁免投掷中获得优势以抵抗{@condition frightened}状态，并且只要你清醒，你始终处于{@spell protection from good and evil}的效果下。

subclassFeature.name: Nomad
entries: {@i 3rd-level Nomad feature}
无论是出生、偶然还是仪式，每个游牧民的思维都与被称为诺斯菲尔的神秘知识网络相连。这种灵能联系使得游牧民能够获取来自遥远地方和不同生命的知识。这些奇怪的流浪者一生都在收集隐藏的传说，以补充连接每个游牧民的信息网络。

entries.name: Optional Rule: Psionic Spellcasting
entries: For mechanics to match the fantasy of a Ranger who wields the psionic power of the Noosphere, consider replacing all Wisdom-based Ranger class and Nomad Conclave features with Intelligence.

subclassFeature.name: Nomad Spells
entries: {@i 3rd-level Nomad feature}
You always have the spells from the table listed below prepared once you reach certain Ranger levels. See the Conclave class feature for how Conclave Spells work.

subclassFeature.name: Expunging Strikes
entries: {@i 3rd-level Nomad feature}

You can imbue your strikes with psionic energy to disrupt your foe's memory. Once per turn when you hit a Quarry with a weapon attack, you can force it to make an Intelligence saving throw against your Spell Save DC. On a failed save, all damage dealt by your attack becomes psychic damage, and the creature cannot see, hear, smell, or sense you in any way until the start of your next turn.

subclassFeature.name: Mystic Knowledge
entries: {@i 3rd-level Nomad feature}

You can use your connection to the Noosphere to draw knowledge from the Nomads of past and present. Each time you finish a long rest, you gain proficiency in one skill or tool, or learn to speak, read, and write a language of your choice. You retain the knowledge of this language or skill proficiency until the end of your next long rest.
Beginning at 11th level in this class, you gain two proficiencies or languages of your choice through this feature at the end of a long rest, following these rules.

subclassFeature.name: Nomad's  Step
entries: {@i 7th-level Nomad feature}

You can temporarily merge your consciousness with the Noosphere to avoid harm and move through the world in strange ways. You gain the two features below. You can use these features a combined number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of once), and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Phase Defense
entries: When you are hit by an attack you can see, you can use a reaction to disappear into the Noosphere, causing that attack to miss. You then instantly reappear in an unoccupied space that you had occupied at some point since the beginning of your previous turn.

entries.name: Psionic Jaunt
entries: As a bonus action, you expend any amount of your remaining movement to instantly teleport a number of feet equal to the movement you expended, reappearing in an unoccupied space you can see within that range.

subclassFeature.name: Strange Movement
entries: {@i 11th-level Nomad feature}
Your connection to the Noosphere has grown. You regain all uses of Nomad's Step when you finish a short or long rest.

subclassFeature.name: Mystical Burst
entries: {@i 15th-level Nomad feature}

When reappearing from the Noosphere you can assault your foes with the residual psionic power. When you teleport with a Nomad Spell or Nomad feature, you can force all creatures within 10 feet of the point you appear to make an Intelligence saving throw against your Spell save DC. They take psychic damage equal to one roll of your Quarry Die on a failed save, and half as much on a successful saving throw.

subclassFeature.name: Stargazer
entries: 凡人们一直将目光投向星空，用星星来讲述过去的故事，观察现在的征兆，有些人甚至相信通过观察天体的运动，可以预测他人的命运。星象观察者花费一生时间研究星星和星座，并学会利用它们的辐射力量来战胜他们的敌人。

subclassFeature.name: Constellation Magic
entries: {@i 3rd-level Stargazer feature}

You draw your power from the constellations of the night sky. Each time you finish a long rest, you attune yourself to one of the Constellations below. While attuned, you always have the corresponding Constellation spells, one cantrip and 1st-level spell, prepared. They become Ranger spells for you, but they don't count against the total number of spells you prepare.

While attuned, you have both the cantrip and 1st-level spell that correspond to that Constellation prepared. Both become Ranger spells for you, but they don't count against the total number of Ranger spells that you can prepare each day.
You can cast your 1st-level Constellation spell once, at the level of your highest level slot on the Ranger table. You regain the ability to do so when you finish a short or long rest.

subclassFeature.name: Celestial Guidance
entries: {@i 3rd-level Stargazer feature}
You gain proficiency in cartographer's or navigator's tools. Whenever you make a check with either tool you add one roll of your Quarry Die to the result.
Finally, you cannot become lost so long as you can see the night sky.

subclassFeature.name: Stargazer Spells
entries: {@i 3rd-level Stargazer feature}
一旦你达到这个职业的特定等级，你总是准备下表中的法术。查看游侠（Ranger）专业领域（Conclave）类特性，了解专业领域法术的使用方式。

subclassFeature.name: Threads of Fate
entries: {@i 7th-level Stargazer feature}
你可以利用星辰赐予你的洞察力来扭转命运的纽带。作为一种反应，当你或你能看到的另一个生物在30英尺内进行能力检定或豁免投掷时，你可以将你的感知调整值（最少为+1）添加到投掷结果中。你可以在投掷之后，但在得知投掷成功或失败之前使用这个反应。
你可以使用这个反应的次数等于你的感知调整值（最少一次），当你完成一次长休时，你恢复所有已用次数。

subclassFeature.name: Starlight Strikes
entries: {@i 11th-level Stargazer feature}

You infuse your weapons with the power of celestial starlight. Once per turn, when you hit a creature with a weapon attack or damage it with a Ranger spell, you deal additional radiant damage equal to one roll of your Quarry Die.

subclassFeature.name: Resplendent Soul
entries: {@i 15-level Stargazer feature}

When a creature you can see targets you with an attack, you can use a reaction to release a targeted flash of light toward it, forcing it to make a Constitution saving throw against your Spell save DC. On a failure, it takes radiant damage equal to three rolls of your Quarry Die, and the attack misses you.

You can use this reaction a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of once), and you regain all uses when you finish a long rest. If you have no uses left, you can expend a spell slot of 1st-level or higher to use this again.

subclassFeature.name: Trapper
entries: {@i 3rd-level Trapper feature}

While all Rangers have some skill with snares and traps, few are true masters of the craft. These Trappers are meticulous planners with mechanical minds who use their skills to plan ambushes and set snares for their foes. They have a talent for anticipating their foe's next move and laying the perfect trap.

subclassFeature.name: Trapper Spells
entries: {@i 3rd-level Trapper feature}
一旦你达到这个职业的特定等级，你总是准备下表中的法术。查看游侠（Ranger）专业领域（Conclave）类特性，了解专业领域法术的使用方式。

subclassFeature.name: Meticulous Fingers
entries: {@i 3rd-level Trapper feature}

You are exceptionally gifted with mechanical objects and traps. You gain proficiency in Sleight of Hand and with Thieves' and Tinker's Tools, and whenever you make an ability check with these tools or skill, you add one roll of your Quarry Die to the result.
Moreover, your precise hands allow you to take the Use an Object action as a bonus action on each of your turns.

subclassFeature.name: Trap Adept
entries: {@i 3rd-level Trapper feature}
You learn the {@optfeature Trapper|LLAR} Knack, but it does not count against your total Knacks Known. If you already know the Trapper Knack you can learn another Knack of your choice.

Also, when you have access to the inner workings of a trap that has been disarmed, you can use tinker's tools to rearm the trap (so long as rearming it is possible), and when you do so, its new DC is equal to your Ranger Spell save DC.

subclassFeature.name: Combat Snares
entries: {@i 7th-level Trapper feature}

You can quickly assemble and utilize makeshift traps in combat. As an action, you can craft a Trap (using the Trapper Knack) and throw it at a space you can see within 20 feet. Creatures in the space of the Trap must make a saving throw as if it had moved into the Trap's space, suffering its effects on a failed save as normal. Traps crafted in this way only last for 1 minute.
You can also take the Use an Object action to throw a Trap that you had already crafted (for example, the Traps crafted with Trapper Knack) at a creature in this way.

subclassFeature.name: Deadly Snares
entries: {@i 11th-level Trapper feature}

A creature marked as your Quarry has disadvantage on its initial saving throw against Traps you created or modified, and it automatically fails its initial saving throw against your Traps if it is unaware of the Trap's location.

subclassFeature.name: Greater Traps
entries: {@i 11th-level Trapper feature}
Your skills as a Trapper have grown. At the end of each long rest, you craft a number of Traps (with Trapper) equal to 1 + your Wisdom modifier (a minimum of 2 Traps).

Additionally, any Traps you craft with {@optfeature Trapper|LLAR} now work on creatures that are Huge or smaller, and if a creature makes a saving throw against your Trap, it takes magical bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage (your choice) equal to three rolls of your Quarry Die on a failure, and half that on a success.

subclassFeature.name: Master of Traps
entries: {@i 15th-level Trapper feature}
You are always ready to lay a trap. When you roll initiative you can use your reaction to craft one Trap and throw it to one unoccupied space you can see within 20 feet of you.
Also, whenever you craft a Trap, you can choose whether it takes up a 10-foot square or a single 5-foot square.

subclassFeature.name: Wrangler
entries: {@i 3rd-level Wrangler feature}
虽然大多数游侠对动物有一定的技能，但那些追求驯兽师生涯的人才是真正擅长驯服野兽的大师。凭借对动物行为的深刻理解，他们驯服和控制各种奇幻生物。粗犷而狂野，驯兽师总是在寻找更奇异和珍稀的生物来驯服和交友。

subclassFeature.name: Wrangler Spells
entries: {@i 3rd-level Wrangler feature}
一旦你达到这个职业的特定等级，你总是准备下表中的法术。查看游侠（Ranger）专业领域（Conclave）类特性，了解专业领域法术的使用方式。

subclassFeature.name: Beast Tamer
entries: {@i 3rd-level Wrangler feature}
Your intimate understanding of animal behaviors and habits grants you certain benefits. You gain proficiency in Athletics or Animal Handling. You also gain the following features:

items: You can mark beasts and monstrosities as your Quarry without expending a use of Ranger's Quarry.
Whenever you make a Strength (Athletics) check to grapple, climb, wrestle, or subdue your Quarry, you can add one roll of your Quarry Die to your roll.
任何{@filter enchantment spell you have prepared that targets a humanoid|spells|class=ranger (llar)|subclass=Alternate Ranger: wrangler (llar:e)|school=e|affects creature types=humanoid}也可以以野兽和畸变生物为目标。

subclassFeature.name: Bring to Heel
entries: {@i 7th-level Wrangler feature}

You can bend creatures of the wild to your will. Whenever a beast or monstrosity that is charmed by you makes a saving throw to end the charmed condition, you can use a reaction to shout at that creature and subtract a roll of your Quarry Die from the result of its saving throw.

You can also command the monsters you tame. Any beast or monstrosity charmed by you acts during your turn for the duration of that charm effect. If you are within 30 feet of the charmed creature and it can hear you, you can use an action to command it to take one of the actions from its stat block.

subclassFeature.name: Monster Tamer
entries: {@i 11th-level Wrangler feature}

Your ability to tame and train creatures is near-supernatural in scope. Any Wrangler feature that normally affects beasts and monstrosities also affects celestials, dragons, fey, fiends, giants, plants, and oozes that have an Intelligence score less than or equal to your Ranger level.
Also, you can command any creature that is charmed by you to take an action from its stat block with a bonus action, so long as that creature is within 30 feet and can hear you.

subclassFeature.name: Wrangler of Legends
entries: {@i 15th-level Wrangler feature}

Once you charm a creature, there is little it can do to escape. When you cast an enchantment spell on a beast, monstrosity, or one of the creature types listed for Monster Tamer, your concentration cannot be broken unless you wish it to be.

Moreover, creatures that are charmed by you gain all of the benefits of Ranger's Quarry (including any of your Knacks that enhance it), and whenever one of these creatures is forced to make a saving throw, you can use your reaction to shout and add one roll of your Quarry Die to the result of its roll, so long as it is within 30 feet and can hear you.

spell.name: Ensnaring Strike (Alternate)

components.m: a weapon worth at least 1 sp

entries: When you hit a creature with a weapon attack, you can cause the point of impact to explode with a writhing mass of thorny vines. The target must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be {@condition restrained} by the vines until the spell ends. Creatures that are Large or larger have advantage on this saving throw.

The {@condition restrained} creature takes {@damage 1d6} piercing damage at the start of each of its turns. The {@condition restrained} creature, or another creature within 5 feet, can use its action to make a Strength check against your Spell save DC, freeing it on a success.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: If you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 1d6|1-9|1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Hail of Thorns (Alternate)
entries: When you hit a creature within range with a ranged weapon attack, you can cause the piece of ammunition to explode into a Hail of Thorns (Alternate)|LLAR. In addition to the normal effect of the attack, the target of your attack and each creature within 5 feet must make a Dexterity saving throw. Creatures take {@damage 1d10} piercing damage on a failure, or half as much damage on a success.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: If you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 1d10|1-6|1d10} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Cordon of Arrows (Alternate)

components.m: three or more arrows or bolts

entries: You plant three pieces of ranged weapon ammunition in the ground within range and transmute them to protect the area. The first creature to move within 30 feet of this enchanted ammunition must make a Dexterity saving throw. The target takes {@damage 3d6} piercing damage on a failed save, and half as much piercing damage on a successful save.
As part of casting this spell, you can designate any number of creatures you choose, and the spell ignores them.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd-level or higher, the amount of ammunition that can be transmuted increases by two for each slot level above 2nd. For each additional piece of ammunition you transmute with this spell, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 1d6|2-9|1d6}.

spell.name: Pass without Trace (Alternate)

components.m: Ashes from a burned leaf of mistletoe

entries: A veil of shadows and silence radiates from you, masking you and your companions from detection. For the duration, you and creatures of your choice within 30 feet are considered to be lightly obscured and gain a bonus to all Dexterity (Stealth) checks equal to your Spellcasting modifier. Creatures under the effect of this spell leave no track or trace of their passing.

spell.name: Conjure Volley (Alternate)

components.m: a single piece of ammunition and a ranged weapon, or one thrown weapon

entries: You fire one piece of nonmagical ammunition from a ranged weapon or throw a nonmagical thrown weapon into the air and choose a point within the normal range of the weapon.

The ammunition or weapon explodes into a multitude of exact copies of it, which fall in a 30-foot-radius, 20-foot-high cylinder centered on the point you chose. Creatures within that area must make a Dexterity saving throw. They take {@damage 6d8} damage of the weapon or ammunition's type on a failed save, and half as much damage on a successful save. Any pieces of ammunition or weapons created by this spell disintegrate once the effects of this spell are resolved.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th-level or higher, the damage of this spell increases by {@scaledamage 6d8|3-9|1d8}, and the radius of the cylinder increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Flame Arrows (Alternate)
entries: You touch a quiver containing ranged weapon ammunition. The first twelve pieces of ammunition drawn from the quiver deal fire damage in place of their normal damage type, plus an additional {@damage 1d6} fire damage on hit. If fired into a flammable object, it bursts into flame on hit. The magic of this spell ends for each piece of ammunition when it hits or misses, and the spell ends after twelve pieces of ammunition are fired.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th-level or higher, you can draw two additional pieces of ammunition from the quiver for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Lightning Arrow (Alternate)
entries: As part of a ranged weapon attack, you can transmute a piece of ammunition, or the thrown weapon, into a bolt of lightning. On hit, the target takes the normal damage of the attack, plus a bonus 4d8 lighting damage. On a miss, the target takes half as much lightning damage, and none of the normal damage.

Regardless if this attack hits or misses, all creatures within 10 feet of the target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, creatures take {@damage 2d8} lighting damage, and half as much lighting damage on a success. The piece of ammunition or thrown weapon then returns to its normal form.
Any creature that takes lighting damage from this spell cannot take reactions until the beginning of your next turn.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage for both effects of the spell increases by {@scaledamage 4d8;2d8|3-9|1d8} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Steel Wind Strike (Alternate)

m.text: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entries: You flourish the weapon used in the casting and then vanish to strike like the wind. Choose up to five creatures you can see within range. Make a melee weapon attack against each target using the weapon used in the casting. On a hit, targets take the normal damage of an attack with that weapon plus an additional {@damage 5d10} force damage.
You can then teleport to an unoccupied space you can see within 5 feet of one of the targets you hit or missed.

spell.name: Swift Quiver (Alternate)

components.m: a quiver containing at least one piece of ammunition

entries: You transmute your quiver so it produces an endless supply of nonmagical ammunition, which seems to leap into your hand when you reach for it.

On each of your turns until the spell ends, you can use a bonus action (including the bonus action used to cast this spell) to make two attacks with a ranged weapon that uses ammunition from this quiver. When you make such a ranged attack, your quiver magically replaces the ammunition you used with a nonmagical copy of that ammunition. Pieces of ammunition created by this spell disintegrate when the spell ends. If the quiver leaves your possession, the spell ends.

optionalfeature.name: Archery
entries: 你在使用远程武器的攻击卷上获得+2的奖励。

optionalfeature.name: Defensive Fighting
entries: 当你穿戴盔甲或挥舞盾牌时，你的盔甲等级获得+1的加成。

optionalfeature.name: Druidic Warrior
entries: 你可以从{@filter Druid spell list|spells|class=Druid}法术清单中选择两个零度法术。它们对你来说算作游侠法术，而你的法术施法能力是智力。每当你在这个职业中获得一个等级时，你可以用德鲁伊法术清单中的另一个零度法术替换其中一个。

optionalfeature.name: Dual Wielding
entries: While two-weapon fighting, you make your off-hand weapon attack as part of your Attack action instead of a bonus action, and you add your ability modifier to the damage of this attack.
When you do, you cannot also make a bonus action attack.

optionalfeature.name: Dueling
entries: 当你单手挥舞近战武器而没有其他武器时，你使用它的伤害卷获得+2的奖励。

optionalfeature.name: Featherweight Fighting
entries: While you are unarmed or wielding only light weapons, and are not wearing medium or heavy armor, your walking speed increases by 10 feet, and you gain a +1 bonus to your damage rolls with light melee weapons and unarmed strikes.

optionalfeature.name: Mariner
entries: So long as you are not wearing medium or heavy armor, or wielding a shield, you have a swimming speed equal to your walking speed, and a +1 bonus to Armor Class.

optionalfeature.name: Melee Marksman
entries: 当你以5英尺内的生物为目标进行远程攻击时，你在攻击卷上没有劣势。
如果你对5英尺范围内的生物进行远程攻击，你可以用你的远程武器攻击该生物，作为一个额外的动作，击中后造成{@dice 1d4}破坏性伤害。

optionalfeature.name: Mountaineer
entries: 当你没有穿着中型或重型盔甲或使用盾牌时，你的攀爬速度等同于你的行走速度，并且你的护甲等级获得+1的奖励。

optionalfeature.name: Mounted Warrior
entries: While you are riding a controlled mount, both you and your mount gain a +1 bonus to your Armor Class, and you can use a bonus action on each of your turns to command the mount to take one action from its stat block or another action.

optionalfeature.name: Protection
entries: 当你能看到的生物攻击你5英尺内的目标时，你可以在他们的攻击卷上施加劣势作为反应。你必须挥舞着近战武器或盾牌。

optionalfeature.name: Strongbow
entries: You can use your Strength, in place of Dexterity, for your attack and damage rolls with both longbows and shortbows. When you do so, you gain a +1 to damage rolls with those weapons.

optionalfeature.name: Thrown Weapon Fighting
entries: 你可以使用具有投掷特性的武器进行攻击。此外，每当你使用投掷武器进行远程武器攻击命中时，你获得+2的伤害加值用于该次攻击的伤害骰投。

optionalfeature.name: Versatile Fighting
entries: While you are wielding a single versatile weapon and no shield, you gain a +1 bonus to your attack rolls with that weapon. While doing so, you can use your bonus action on that turn to make a single grapple or shove attack, or to take the Use an Object action.

optionalfeature.name: Blind Warrior
entries: You have blindsight with a range in feet equal to 5 times your proficiency bonus. In that range, you can see invisible targets and anything that isn't behind total cover or hidden from you.

optionalfeature.name: Brawler
entries: Your unarmed strikes deal bludgeoning damage equal to 1d6 + your Strength modifier on hit. If you have two free hands and use your action to make only unarmed strikes you can make one unarmed strike as a bonus action on that turn.

optionalfeature.name: Alpine Adept
entries: 你的脚步异常稳健。你获得30英尺的攀爬速度，你可以使用你的反应来减少你受到的坠落伤害，减少值等同于你的游侠等级。如果你已经拥有攀爬速度，它将增加10英尺。

optionalfeature.name: Aquatic Adept
entries: 你可以像海洋生物一样在水中游泳。你获得30英尺的游泳速度，在水下时，你可以憋气长达1小时。如果你已经拥有游泳速度，它将增加10英尺。

optionalfeature.name: Favored Foe
entries: You are especially adept at studying, tracking, and hunting a specific type of enemy. Choose one creature type, two races of humanoid (such as gnolls and orcs), or one organization (like a thieves' guild or an evil cult) as your Favored Foe.
Whenever you make a Wisdom check to hunt or track, or an Intelligence check to recall knowledge about a Favored Foe, you can treat a roll of 9 or lower on the d20 as a 10.
You can choose to learn this Knack more than once, but you must choose a new Favored Foe each time you do so.

optionalfeature.name: Herbalist I
entries: You have an extensive knowledge of plants and their healing properties. You gain proficiency with herbalism kits, and you automatically succeed on your Wisdom (Medicine) checks to stabilize creatures at 0 hit points if you use a herbalism kit.

optionalfeature.name: Herbalist II
entries: You have learned to use natural plants and herbs to create healing salves. Over the course of a long rest, you can spend 1 hour using an herbalism kit to create one potion of healing. These potions of healing retain their potency until the end of your next long rest, at which point they become inert.

optionalfeature.name: Herbalist III
entries: When you use your herbalism kit to craft potions of healing during a long rest, you craft a number of potions of healing equal to 1 + your Wisdom modifier (minimum of 2).

optionalfeature.name: Naturalist I
entries: You are an intuitive student of the wilderness. Whenever you would make an Intelligence (Nature) check in the wilderness, you can choose to make a Wisdom (Nature) check instead.
Also, you can make Wisdom (Nature) checks as a bonus action to recall knowledge about one beast or plant you see.

optionalfeature.name: Naturalist II
entries: At the end of a long rest, you can attune to your surrounding environment. Examples include, but are not limited to: arctic, coast, desert, forest, grassland, mountain, or swamp. While in your attuned environment, you gain the following benefits:

items: 你在与本地植物、动物或生态系统有关的智力和智慧检查中具有优势。
觅食或打猎时，你会发现两倍的食物。
除非你是（%0%），否则你不可能感到惊讶。
You have advantage on your initiative rolls so long as you are not surprised or incapacitated.

optionalfeature.name: Natural Regeneration
entries: During a short rest, you can recover spell slots of a combined level equal to your Wisdom modifier. Once you do, you must finish a long rest before you can use this feature again.

optionalfeature.name: Slayer I
entries: When you hit a creature with a weapon attack you can mark it as your Quarry as part of the attack, applying your Quarry damage bonus and other benefits to the damage roll.

optionalfeature.name: Slayer II
entries: Your tracking abilities have become supernaturally accurate. You can mark a creature as your Quarry by studying signs of its passing, such as tracks, that were left within 24 hours.
Moreover, whenever you make a Wisdom (Perception) or a Wisdom (Survival) check to locate or track your Quarry, you can treat a roll of 7 or lower on the d20 as an 8.

optionalfeature.name: Slayer III
entries: When you hit a Quarry with a weapon attack, you can force it to make a Constitution saving throw against your Spell save DC. On a failed save, it is blinded, cannot speak, deafened, or restrained (your choice) until the start of your next turn. You can only use this feature on your Quarry once per turn.

optionalfeature.name: Stalker I
entries: You are a master at remaining undetected in the wilderness. You have advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks you make to hide while you are in natural environments.

optionalfeature.name: Stalker II
entries: You have learned to hunt your prey while remaining unseen. You can take the Hide action as a bonus action on your turn.

optionalfeature.name: Stalker III
entries: You cannot be tracked, even by magic. You are always under the effects of the nondetection spell, and you can't be tracked by divination magic or magical means unless you wish to be.

optionalfeature.name: Stalker IV
entries: You can ward yourself to briefly disappear from sight. When you take the Hide action, you, along with anything you are wearing or carrying, become invisible until the start of your next turn. This ends early if you attack or cast a spell.

optionalfeature.name: Strider I
entries: You ignore the effects of difficult terrain imposed by natural environments, such as undergrowth, snow, or swamp. You also can't become lost so long as you can see the night sky.
Finally, you and up to 10 creatures who travel with you don't have your travel slowed by natrual difficult terrain.

optionalfeature.name: Strider II
entries: Once in your sights, you pursue your enemies relentlessly. You can take the Dash action as a bonus action on your turn.

optionalfeature.name: Strider III
entries: You can surmount almost any obstacle that would block your path. Your walking speed increases by 10 feet, and you ignore the effects of any difficult terrain imposed by spells, magical phenomena, or any other supernatural effect.

optionalfeature.name: Strider IV
entries: 你在这个世界上移动，甚至不受最强大的魔法和束缚的阻碍。在有意识的情况下，你总是受到（%0%）法术的影响。

optionalfeature.name: Survivor I
entries: 你在荒野中的时间锻炼了你的身体。作为你回合的一个奖励动作，你可以给自己提供临时生命值，数值等同于你的体质调整值（最少为1）。（Constitution）

optionalfeature.name: Survivor II
entries: 你的身体可以迅速从伤害中恢复。当你消耗一个命中率来恢复命中率时，你会恢复与你的智慧修正值相等的额外命中率（最小为1个命中率）。

optionalfeature.name: Survivor III
entries: When you make a death saving throw, you add your Wisdom modifier to the roll (minimum of +1). If the result of your roll is 20 or higher, it is as if you had rolled a 20 on the d20.

optionalfeature.name: Trapper
entries: You can construct natural traps. Over the course of 1 hour, which can be during a short or long rest, you can use a knife, natural materials, and expend 10 feet of rope to craft a Trap.

As an action, you can set one of these Traps in an adjacent unoccupied 5-foot space. The first Large or smaller creature to move into that space must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw against your Spell save DC or become restrained.
As an action, the restrained creature, or another creature within 5 feet of it, can use an action to make a Strength check against your Spell save DC, freeing the creature on a success.
As an action (separate from setting the Trap), you can hide the Trap. If hidden, a successful Intelligence (Investigation) against your Spell save DC is required to detect the Trap.

optionalfeature.name: Wild Insights I
entries: You have a special insight into the mannerisms and sounds of wild animals. You can communicate with beasts as if you were always under the effect of a {@spell speak with animals} spell.

optionalfeature.name: Wild Insights II
entries: 你与一位次要的自然精灵绑定在一起。你学会了{@spell find familiar}法术。对你而言，它算作一个游侠法术，你总是准备好它，但它不会计入你每天准备的法术总数。当你施放这个法术时，你召唤的随从总是一只精灵生物。

optionalfeature.name: Wild Insights III
entries: 你的自然精神的力量会增长。当你施展{@spell find familiar}时，它可以采取{@filter any beast of CR 1/2 or lower|bestiary|Challenge Rating=[&0;&1/2]|type=beast}的形式。

optionalfeature.name: Arctic Adept
entries: 你已经适应了冰冻苔原。你获得对冰冷伤害的抗性。此外，你和与你同行的生物（最多10个），在抵抗北极环境的负面影响的豁免投掷中获得优势。

optionalfeature.name: Desert Adept
entries: 你已经适应了灼热的沙漠环境。你获得对火焰伤害的抗性。此外，你和与你同行的生物（最多10个）在抵抗沙漠环境的负面影响时，拥有优势豁免投掷。

optionalfeature.name: Fell Handed I
entries: 当你用武器攻击一个生物取得关键一击时，你在下一回合结束前对该生物进行的下一次攻击中具有优势。

optionalfeature.name: Fell Handed II
entries: 当你对一个生物取得关键打击时，你对该生物的攻击卷轴的关键打击范围会扩大1。
例如，如果你第一次对生物造成了重击，那么当你对该生物进行攻击检定时，19或20都会造成重击。

optionalfeature.name: Jungle Adept
entries: 你已经适应了丛林环境。你获得对毒性伤害的抗性。此外，你和与你同行的（最多10只）生物在抵抗丛林环境的负面影响的豁免检定中获得优势。

optionalfeature.name: Hedge Knight I
entries: Though you live in the wilds you still have some military training. You gain proficiency in heavy armor.

optionalfeature.name: Hedge Knight II
entries: Though you are a wild wanderer you understand chivalry and politics. Whenever you make an Intelligence (History) or Charisma (Persuasion) check, you can use Wisdom in place of Intelligence or Charisma, respectively.

optionalfeature.name: Rider I
entries: 每当你进行一次感知（动物处理）检定来控制、训练或驯服坐骑时，你可以将d20上的7或更低的点数视为8。此外，从训练有素的坐骑上下来只需消耗你5英尺的移动。

optionalfeature.name: Rider II
entries: 你已经训练过从坐骑上战斗。你获得了骑士战士格斗风格(Mounted Warrior Fighting Style)。如果你已经知道这个格斗风格，你可以学习另一个你选择的游侠(Ranger)格斗风格。
此外，您可以骑乘与您尺寸相同或更大的坐骑。

optionalfeature.name: Rider III
entries: 你是一名骑战专家。当你骑乘坐骑受到攻击时，你可以使用一次反应，将自己变成攻击的目标，而不是你的坐骑。
此外，如果你骑乘的坐骑进行豁免投掷，你可以使用你的反应来让它获得优势进行投掷。

optionalfeature.name: Planar Adept
entries: You have adapted to life on one of the great planes of the multiverse. Choose one plane from the table below (or the corresponding plane in your setting). You gain resistance to the corresponding damage type. Also, you and up to ten creatures who travel with you, have advantage on saving throws to resist the hostile effects of that plane.
You can learn this Knack more than once, but you must choose a different plane of existence each time you do so.

optionalfeature.name: Underground Adept
entries: You are especially skilled at navigating the winding tunnels under the earth. You gain darkvision out to a range of 60 feet. If you already have darkvision its range increases by 30 feet.

As an action you can close your eyes to gain tremorsense out to a 60-foot radius. In that radius, you can sense anything touching the ground. This special sense lasts for 1 minute, or until you open your eyes. Once you use this action you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.

optionalfeature.name: Woodsman I
entries: You are familiar with forests, trees, and raw timber. You gain proficiency with woodcarver's tools, and you have advantage on ability checks to identify and construct things from wood.
Also, at the end of each long rest, you can use woodcarver's tools and raw timber to craft a number of arrows, bolts, clubs, javelins, and quarterstaffs equal to your proficiency bonus.

optionalfeature.name: Woodsman II
entries: You can easily see the strengths and weak points of wooden objects and creatures. You gain the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency with carpenter's tools. Anything you construct from wood has twice as many hit points.
If you hit a tree, raw timber, or a wooden structure with a melee weapon attack, it is an automatic critical hit.
If you hit a plant or wood construct with a melee weapon attack, you score a critical hit on a roll of 18 through 20.

trait.name: Hit Dice
entries: The Beast has a total number of d8 Hit Dice equal to your Ranger level. It also gains all the normal benefits of both short and long rests.

trait.name: Primal Bond
entries: 你可以把你的PB加到野兽所做的任何能力检查或救赎动作上。

trait.name: Tremorsense
entries: 你的野兽知道与地面接触的任何物体在30英尺范围内的位置。

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} +2+PB to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 + 2 + PB} piercing or slashing damage (your choice).

trait.name: Hit Dice
entries: The Beast has a total number of d8 Hit Dice equal to your Ranger level. It also gains all the normal benefits of both short and long rests.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the Beast moves at least 20 ft. in a line toward a target and hits it with a Maul attack, the target takes bonus slashing damage equal to a roll of your Quarry Die. If it is Large or smaller it must succeed on a Strength saving throw or fall {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Primal Bond
entries: 你可以把你的PB加到野兽所做的任何能力检查或救赎动作上。

action.name: Maul
entries: {@atk mw} + 2 + PB to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d8 + 2 + PB} piercing or slashing damage (your choice).

trait.name: Hit Dice
entries: The Beast has a total number of d8 Hit Dice equal to your Ranger level. It also gains all the normal benefits of both short and long rests.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: 这只野兽可以在空气和水中呼吸。

trait.name: Primal Bond
entries: 你可以把你的PB加到野兽所做的任何能力检查或救赎动作上。

action.name: Pseudopod
entries: {@atk mw} + 2 + PB to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 + 2 + PB} bludgeoning damage, and if the target is Large or smaller, it can choose to instantly grapple it (escape DC equal to your Spell save DC). While grappling a creature, it can only use its Pseudopod to attack that creature.

trait.name: Hit Dice
entries: The Beast has a total number of d8 Hit Dice equal to your Ranger level. It also gains all the normal benefits of both short and long rests.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: 当野兽飞出敌人的范围时，不会引起机会攻击。

trait.name: Primal Bond
entries: 你可以把你的PB加到野兽所做的任何能力检查或救赎动作上。

action.name: Shred
entries: {@atk mw} + 3 + PB to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d4 + 3 + PB} slashing damage.

monster.name: Draconic Companion
languages: Draconic, understands any languages spoken by the Drake Guard bound to it.

trait.name: Hit Dice
entries: Your Companion has a total number of d8 Hit Dice equal to your Ranger level. It also gains all the normal benefits of both short and long rests.

trait.name: Soul Bond
entries: You add your PB to any ability check or saving throw that the Draconic Companion makes.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} + 3 + PB to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d4 + 3 + PB} slashing damage, + {@damage 1d4} Essence damage.

feat.name: Alternate Crossbow Expert
entries: You have trained extensively with the crossbow and can use it more efficiently than most. You gain the following benefits:

items: You can ignore the loading property of all crossbows.
You can load a crossbow with a hand that is holding a one-handed weapon, shield, or another Tiny object.
Being within 5 feet of a hostile creature does not impose disadvantage on your ranged attack rolls with crossbows.
When you take the Attack action and make an attack with a one-handed melee weapon, you can use a bonus action to make an attack with a hand crossbow you are holding.

feat.name: Alternate Dual Wielder
entries: You have trained extensively to effectively fight wielding two melee weapons at once. You gain the following benefits:

items: You gain a +1 bonus to your Armor Class while you are wielding a separate melee weapon in each hand.
You can engage in two-weapon fighting even if the one-handed melee weapons you are wielding are not light.
You can draw or stow two one-handed weapons when you would normally be able to draw or stow only one.
When you make an opportunity attack while engaging in two-weapon fighting you can make an attack against the creature with both melee weapons you are wielding.

feat.name: Alternate Sharpshooter
entries: You have trained extensively with ranged weapons to become a master marksman. You gain the benefits listed below:

items: Attacking a target within a ranged weapon's long range does not impose disadvantage on your attack roll.
Your attacks with ranged weapons can ignore half-cover, and treat three-quarters cover as half-cover.
You can use a bonus action to give yourself advantage on your next ranged weapon attack roll on your current turn.

feat.name: Survivalist Training
entries: You have been trained to survive, track, and explore in the wild, much like a Ranger. You gain the benefits listed below:

items: You learn one Knack of your choice from those available to the Alternate Ranger. If the Knack requires you to roll a Quarry Die, you roll a d4 unless your Quarry Die is higher. If the Knack forces a saving throw, the DC is equal to 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Wisdom modifier.

feat.name: Wild Companion
entries: You have forged a bond with an animal companion that will adventure by your side. Choose a beast of CR 1/8 or lower to be your Wild Companion. This Companion is friendly to you, and it obeys your commands to the best of its abilities.

Your Companion uses its normal stat block, but it learns to understand one language of your choice that you speak. You and your Companion can communicate simple ideas to each other using a series of clicks, whistles, and gestures. It gains all the normal benefits of both short and long rests.

In combat, your Wild Companion acts during your turn. It can move and use its reaction on its own, but it will only take the Dodge action on its turn unless you use a bonus action to command it to take an action from its stat block or another action. If you are incapacitated, your Companion will defend itself to the best of its ability. If you die, your Companion will do everything in its power to flee and return to its home.
If your Companion dies, you can spend 8 hours tracking and training a new Wild Companion, but only if a suitable beast of CR 1/8 or lower can be found in your local area within an 8-hour period.
